name: Cryo Elemental Infusion
description:
The character to which this is attached has their Physical DMG dealt converted to Cryo DMG, and Cryo DMG dealt by the character +1.
(Lasts until the Round ends)
descriptionraw: The character to which this is attached has their $[K100] dealt converted to $[K101], and $[K101] dealt by the character +1.\n(Lasts until the Round ends)
descriptionreplaced: The character to which this is attached has their {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color> dealt converted to {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>, and {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> dealt by the character +1.\n(Lasts until the Round ends)
